articles.title: Twitter employees are flooding Blind with bad reviews of Elon Musk - Business Insider
articles.description: One user, who posted on the day the company sent staff a memo announcing layoffs, said employees were treated as a "labor robot."
articles.content:
Twitter employees are flooding the employee forum Blind with bad and some goodreviews about the company and its new CEO, Elon Musk.

articles.title: Permanent Daylight Saving Time will hurt our health, experts say - CNN
articles.description: Daylight Saving Time all year round? There's a push by the US Senate to make it so, but it's a terrible idea that may ruin our health, sleep experts say.
articles.content:
Editors Note: Sign up for CNNs Sleep, But Better newsletter series. Our seven-part guide has helpful hints to achieve better sleep.

articles.title: Cops called to Carter’s home before death - news.com.au
articles.description: Troubled singer Aaron Carter was gearing up to sue his ex-fiancee Melanie Martin – who is the mother of his child – for “defamation of character”, after she claimed he broke three of her ribs during a fight.
